cartas.title: Old TV 1940
cartas.description: This project is an old TV from 1940, it was made with many polygons, it was developed by our employee Kandry Luck.
cartas.creator: Emma Myers

cartas.title: Low Poly Landscape
cartas.description: This is a low polygon landscape made in blender by our collaborator Junior Mersel.
cartas.creator: Guillermo Ortiz

cartas.title: Stylized house
cartas.description: This is a stylized house made of a large number of polygons made in Blender by artist Lola Pressman.
cartas.creator: Leila Liland

cartas.title: Neon city
cartas.description: Adriana Lorde high polygon neon cityscape showcases a vibrant futuristic city with detailed architecture, bright neon lights, and flying vehicles. His advanced texturing, realistic shading, and careful composition highlight his Blender expertise.
cartas.creator: Adriana Lorde

cartas.title: Stylized Character
cartas.description: This is a stylized character created in Blender by our collaborator Willian Lin. The design features unique proportions and expressive details, showcasing Willian's skill in character modeling and animation. The use of vibrant colors and dynamic poses highlights his creativity and technical expertise in bringing imaginative designs to life.
cartas.creator: Nelson Fernando

cartas.title: Mercedes Benz
cartas.description: High polygon Mercedez Benz made in Blender by our collaborator.
cartas.creator: Carlos Torres

cartas.title: Fisherman's House
cartas.description: This is a retro room from the 80s. It is low poly so that it does not consume much and can be used in video games.
cartas.creator: Yamir Alisha

cartas.title: Fisherman's House
cartas.description: This project is a stylized house created in Blender.
cartas.creator: Emma Myers

cartas.title: Textured Viking
cartas.description: This is a textured project of a Viking humanoid that can be used in video games.
cartas.creator: Leida Liland
